name: UnknownAttributesAttributeTest
description: Unit tests for the UnknownAttributesAttribute class, focusing on attribute type, attribute ID addition, decoding, encoding, equality, attribute retrieval, count, iteration, data length, and name.

test_cases.name: testUnknownAttributesAttribute
test_cases.description: Verifies that the constructed object has the correct (UNKNOWN-ATTRIBUTES) type.

test_cases.name: testAddAttributeID
test_cases.description: Verifies that the passed attribute id is added to the list of attributes and that a second addition of the same id would not augment the attribute count.

test_cases.name: testDecodeAttributeBody
test_cases.description: Tests whether a sample binary array is properly decoded.

test_cases.name: testEncode
test_cases.description: Creates a new UnknownAttributesAttribute, encodes it, and asserts equality with binMessagesFixture.unknownAttsEncodeExpectedResult.

test_cases.name: testEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method against a null, a different, and an identical object.

test_cases.name: testGetAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests that getAttribute() returns the correct attribute id, preserving entry order.

test_cases.name: testGetAttributeCount
test_cases.description: Adds some attributes and tests whether their number is properly calculated. Tests duplicate id handling as well.

test_cases.name: testGetAttributes
test_cases.description: Same as testGetAttributeID, only attribute attributes are extracted through the getAttributes()'s iterator.

test_cases.name: testGetDataLength
test_cases.description: Adds a fixed number of attributes and checks data length accordingly. Test is first performed for an odd number of attributes and then again (after adding another attribute id). Both results should be the same.

test_cases.name: testGetName
test_cases.description: Tests whether getName returns a relevant name.

name: PseudoTcpTestPingPong
description: Tests for ping-pong (request/response) scenarios using PseudoTCPBase.

test_cases.name: testPingPong1xMtu
test_cases.description: Test sending <= 1x MTU of data in each ping/pong. Should take <10ms.

test_cases.name: testPingPong3xMtu
test_cases.description: Test sending 2x-3x MTU of data in each ping/pong. Should take <10ms.

test_cases.name: testPingPong2xMtu
test_cases.description: Test sending 1x-2x MTU of data in each ping/pong. Should take ~1s, due to interaction between Nagling and Delayed ACK.

test_cases.name: testPingPong2xMtuWithAckDelayOff
test_cases.description: Test sending 1x-2x MTU of data in each ping/pong with Delayed ACK off. Should take <10ms.

test_cases.name: testPingPong2xMtuWithNaglingOff
test_cases.description: Test sending 1x-2x MTU of data in each ping/pong with Nagling off. Should take <10ms.

test_cases.name: testPingPongShortSegments
test_cases.description: Test sending a ping as pair of short (non-full) segments. Should take ~1s, due to Delayed ACK interaction with Nagling.

test_cases.name: testPingPongShortSegmentsWithNaglingOff
test_cases.description: Test sending ping as a pair of short (non-full) segments, with Nagling off. Should take <10ms.

test_cases.name: testPingPongShortSegmentsWithAckDelayOff
test_cases.description: Test sending <= 1x MTU of data ping/pong, in two segments, no Delayed ACK. Should take ~1s.

name: TransactionSupportTests

test_cases.name: testClientRetransmissions
test_cases.description: Tests that requests are retransmitted if no response is received.

test_cases.name: testServerRetransmissionHiding
test_cases.description: Tests that retransmissions are not seen by the server user and that it only gets a single request.

test_cases.name: testServerResponseRetransmissions
test_cases.description: Tests that once a request has been answered by the server, retransmissions of this request are not propagated to the UA and are automatically handled with a retransmission of the last seen response.

test_cases.name: testUniqueIDs
test_cases.description: Tests that transaction IDs are unique.

test_cases.name: testClientTransactionMaxRetransmisssionsConfigurationParameter
test_cases.description: Tests whether the properties for configuring the maximum number of retransmissions in a transaction are working properly.

test_cases.description: Tests whether the properties for configuring the minimum transaction wait interval is working properly.

test_cases.name: testMaxWaitIntervalConfigurationParameter
